page.title: 08Religion
page.content: The Church is divided {1/3 Methodist and{2/3 Anglican (Church of England). Church goers comprise 10% population, Church supporters another 10%. Belleau has 1 active{Anglican}(monthly). Aby 1 active{Methodist Chapel}(weekly). Authorpe has 1 active{Methodist Chapel (monthly) - services of both denominations are conducted in the Methodist Chaples - combined services in the Church of England yearly. One Church of England vicar with 11 parishes including this area. The Methodist Minister or local preacher takes services weekly in Aby. Average attendance at both demoninations 15 persons - mainly middle-aged but with a small number of young parents. Church activities fairly well supported - there is an active choir. One{lady member}of the Church has been appointed as{Assistant}at Communion.
